message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY 

This paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing tasks such as summarization and entity recognition. It could also belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as it involves selecting relevant articles from a large pool of documents. Additionally, it could be categorized under cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as these fields are closely related to NLP and information retrieval. Finally, it could also be classified under cs.CY (Computers and Society) as it addresses the lack of a standard dataset and evaluative methodology for the problem, which has implications for the ethical use of AI in society.
